Properties.commandText:
SELECT [h].[Id], [h].[DeleteBy], [h].[DeleteDate], [h].[InsertBy], [h].[InsertDate], [h].[IsDeleted], [h].[Name], [h].[TenantCompanyId], [h].[UpdateBy], [h].[UpdateDate]
FROM [Hr_Departments] AS [h]
WHERE [h].[TenantCompanyId] = N'' AND [h].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [h].[Id] DESC
